RationalPiano.Graphic
Interface IGraphicVisualizationElement

All Superinterfaces:
IDrawable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphicVerticalLineDefault, GraphicVerticalLineTriangle, GraphicVerticalLineTriangle2
public interface IGraphicVisualizationElement
extends IDrawable

Interface for a graphic visualization element which can be changed in its appearance.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Fabian Ehrentraud
Licence:
Licensed under the Open Software License (OSL 3.0)
Date:
2011-01-15

Method Summary
 void draw()
          Draws the element with a shape and color gradient according to its volume.
 void setActive(boolean active)
          Sets this element either active or inactive which changes its appearance.
 void setVolume(double volume)
          Sets the graphic strengthness to draw this element with.
 

Method Detail

setVolume

void setVolume(double volume)
Sets the graphic strengthness to draw this element with.

Parameters:
volume - 0<=volume<=1

setActive

void setActive(boolean active)
Sets this element either active or inactive which changes its appearance.

Parameters:
active - True to set this element active or False to set it inactive.

draw

void draw()
Draws the element with a shape and color gradient according to its volume.

Specified by:
draw in interface IDrawable
Warning:
Changes papplet's color mode to HSB.
